safari.title: Safari Tent
safari.shortDescription: 12 m² canvas tent on a 3×6 m platform. Twin/King, fan, power points, mosquito mesh, private terrace. Shared ablutions.
detailedFeatures: Two single beds (or King) with pedestals and shaded lamps
Mosquito mesh on doors/windows • strong fan • power points
Small shelving unit for clothing/essentials
Private terrace with rolled palm-leaf chairs facing the tropical garden
Shared bathrooms (ladies/gents): 2 hot/cold showers & 2 toilets each
Village can be lively during holidays; free earplugs at reception

comfort.title: Comfort Tent
comfort.shortDescription: Upgraded 12 m² tent with extra privacy (side/back walls), private terrace and your own en-suite bathroom under a thatched roof.
detailedFeatures: Twin/King bed setup • lamps • convenient light switches
Mosquito mesh • strong fan • power points
Private wood terrace with rolled palm-leaf chairs
At the back: private bathroom (shower, toilet, sink) under a grass-thatched roof
Village liveliness during peak/holidays; earplugs available

cottage.title: Garden Cottage
cottage.shortDescription: Airy cottage with queen bed, A/C (inverter), desk & dining table, private terrace and bathroom in a charming roundavel.
detailedFeatures: Roman-tiled roof, high white ceiling with dark wood beams
Terracotta floor, warm wheatfields-painted walls
Queen bed • working desk with shaded lamp • dining table with chairs
Suitcase shelves, clothes rack and extra shelving
Inverter A/C (cool & heat) • dimmable main light
Private bath in grass-thatched roundavel (shower, sink, toilet)
Private wooden terrace with camping chairs and side table

chalet.title: Thatched Chalet
chalet.shortDescription: Secluded, romantic tiny chalet under palms and strelitzia. A/C, private bathroom, terrace, Twin/King bed setup.
detailedFeatures: Grass-thatched roof on bluegum poles • autumn-slate floor
Wheatfields-painted walls • tranquil, shaded setting
Dinner table with chairs • air conditioning
Private bathroom (shower, sink, toilet)
Two singles or King with pedestals • private terrace with palm-leaf chairs

safari.title: Safari Tent
safari.shortDescription: 130 sq ft canvas tent on a 10×20 ft platform. Twin/King, fan, power outlets, mosquito mesh, private terrace. Shared bathrooms.
detailedFeatures: Two twin beds (or King) with nightstands and shaded lamps
Mosquito mesh on doors/windows • strong fan • power outlets
Small shelving unit for clothing/essentials
Private terrace with rolled palm-leaf chairs facing the tropical garden
Shared bathrooms (ladies/gents): 2 hot/cold showers & 2 toilets each

detailedFeatures: [SW] Grass-thatched roof on bluegum poles • autumn-slate floor
[SW] Wheatfields-painted walls • tranquil, shaded setting
[SW] Dinner table with chairs • air conditioning
[SW] Private bathroom (shower, sink, toilet)
[SW] Two singles or King with pedestals • private terrace with palm-leaf chairs

safari.title: [JA] Safari Tent
safari.shortDescription: [JA] 12 m² canvas tent on a 3×6 m platform. Twin/King, fan, power points, mosquito mesh, private terrace. Shared ablutions.
detailedFeatures: [JA] Two single beds (or King) with pedestals and shaded lamps
[JA] Mosquito mesh on doors/windows • strong fan • power points
[JA] Small shelving unit for clothing/essentials
[JA] Private terrace with rolled palm-leaf chairs facing the tropical garden
[JA] Shared bathrooms (ladies/gents): 2 hot/cold showers & 2 toilets each
[JA] Village can be lively during holidays; free earplugs at reception

comfort.title: [JA] Comfort Tent
comfort.shortDescription: [JA] Upgraded 12 m² tent with extra privacy (side/back walls), private terrace and your own en-suite bathroom under a thatched roof.
detailedFeatures: [JA] Twin/King bed setup • lamps • convenient light switches
[JA] Mosquito mesh • strong fan • power points
[JA] Private wood terrace with rolled palm-leaf chairs
[JA] At the back: private bathroom (shower, toilet, sink) under a grass-thatched roof
[JA] Village liveliness during peak/holidays; earplugs available

cottage.title: [JA] Garden Cottage
cottage.shortDescription: [JA] Airy cottage with queen bed, A/C (inverter), desk & dining table, private terrace and bathroom in a charming roundavel.
detailedFeatures: [JA] Roman-tiled roof, high white ceiling with dark wood beams
[JA] Terracotta floor, warm wheatfields-painted walls
[JA] Queen bed • working desk with shaded lamp • dining table with chairs
[JA] Suitcase shelves, clothes rack and extra shelving
[JA] Inverter A/C (cool & heat) • dimmable main light
[JA] Private bath in grass-thatched roundavel (shower, sink, toilet)
[JA] Private wooden terrace with camping chairs and side table
